compliments: This book gonna amazing for those who wants to start reading book. All stories are outstanding. You'll get a good message after finishing each and every story. And you,ll get motivation as well
name: Mahedi Hasan

compliments: This is a great book.I enjoyed all of the stories through the book. Every story enables us to see fact and learn something from them and applies them.Every story make us happy or sad . Overall excellent story book
name: Monirul Islam

compliments: Very well written from an enormously qualified writer. You will find peace as you go through chapter by chapter.Well done!!
name: Murshid Ahmed Munna

compliments: This is the first book which made my expectations rise as high as the sky but this one was average..I really expected more.good wishes for the writer
name: Rubel Hossain

compliments: good book.. Every parents should read this book..Family crisis will remove if Every gurdian follow this step which are written that book..
name: Tamanna Rahaman

compliments: This book is just wonderful..I am so happy to buy and read this book..It was really really good..Hope writer will give us better for the next time..
name: Foysal Khan
